mapper.select: select comp_seq, comp_section, comp_org, comp_branch, comp_master, comp_business, comp_category, comp_hp, comp_regidate, comp_status from user_company_tbl
select comp_seq, comp_section, comp_org, comp_branch, comp_master, comp_business, comp_category, comp_hp, comp_regidate, comp_status from user_company_tbl where comp_seq = #{comp_seq}
